Sysmon Comment.description: XML comment line to describe or document section of the config.

body: condition="${1|is,is not,contains,contains any,contains all,excludes,excludes all,excludes any,begin with,not begin with,not end with,end with,less than,more than,image|}"
<!-- Hashing algorithms that can be used are md5,sha1,sha256,imphash or * for all,
more than once can be specified separated by using comas -->
<!-- Checking for signature revocation for drivers. -->

Template Sysmon Linux_Config.description: Initial base configuration for Sysmon on Linux

Archive Directory Name.description: XML comment line to describe or document section of the config.

Field Sizes for Syslog.description: specify how long you want fields to be so you can avoid the Syslog overrun/broken XML problem.
